derivation: or אַשֻּׁר; apparently from H833 (אָשַׁר) (in the sense of successful);
outline:
Asshur or Assyria = "a step"
  1. the second son of Shem, eponymous ancestor of the Assyrians
  2. the people of Assyria
  3. the nation, Assyria
  4. the land, Assyria or Asshur
kjv_def: Asshur, Assur, Assyria, Assyrians. See H838 (אָשֻׁר).
strongs_def: Ashshur, the second son of Shem; also his descendants and the country occupied by them (i.e. Assyria), its region and its empire
